content: snake scarf thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size 5 wide x length desired size guide child = 50 preteen = 57 women = 68 men = 73 materials worsted weight 5mm hook ribbon yarn #4 needle tacky/fabric glue ~175 to 300 yds scissors ~200 yds for felt preteen wood beads gauge not necessary size is made to length stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch decrease -decrease hdcdec -half st -stitch half_double_crochet -half double double_crochet chain -chain crochet decrease single_crochet -single hdcinc -half hdcdec3tog -half crochet double_crochet double_crochet 3 increase -increase
